data.eml:eml: Notes on Geraecormobius clavifemur (Mello­Leitão, 1927) and description of Geraecormobius reitzi n. sp. (Arachnida: Opiliones: Gonyleptidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vasconcelos, Eduardo G. (2005): Notes on Geraecormobius clavifemur (Mello­Leitão, 1927) and description of Geraecormobius reitzi n. sp. (Arachnida: Opiliones: Gonyleptidae). Zootaxa 1088: 1-10, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273329
